scripts.build:all: moon build --target js && vite build && rolldown -c rolldown.config.mjs
scripts.test:unit: node --no-warnings -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));delete p.type;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2))" && (moon test -p mizchi/moonlight/model; moon test -p mizchi/moonlight/components); node --no-warnings -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));p.type='module';fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2))"
